020
021import net.tnemc.item.AbstractItemStack;
022import net.tnemc.item.JSONHelper;
023import net.tnemc.item.component.SerialComponent;
024import net.tnemc.item.component.helper.PatternData;
025import net.tnemc.item.platform.ItemPlatform;
026import org.json.simple.JSONArray;
027import org.json.simple.JSONObject;
028
029import java.util.ArrayList;
030import java.util.Arrays;
031import java.util.List;
032import java.util.Objects;
033
034/**
035 * BannerComponent - List of all patterns applied to the banner or the shield.
036 *
037 * @see <a href="https://minecraft.wiki/w/Data_component_format#banner_patterns">Reference</a>
038 *
039 * @author creatorfromhell
040 * @since 0.2.0.0
041 */
042
043public abstract class BannerPatternsComponent<I extends AbstractItemStack<T>, T> implements SerialComponent<I, T> {
044
045  protected final List<PatternData> patterns = new ArrayList<>();
046
047  /**
048   * Represents a component that handles banner patterns for an object.
049   */
050  public BannerPatternsComponent() {
051
052  }
053
054  /**
055   * Creates a new BannerPatternsComponent with the provided list of PatternData objects.
056   *
057   * @param patterns The list of PatternData objects to initialize the component with.
058   */
059  public BannerPatternsComponent(final List<PatternData> patterns) {
060
061    this.patterns.addAll(patterns);
062  }
063
064  /**
065   * @return the type of component this is.
066   */
067  @Override
068  public String identifier() {
069    return "banner_patterns";
070  }
071
072  /**
073   * Converts this component's data to a JSON object.
074   *
075   * @return The JSONObject representing this component's data.
076   */
077  @Override
078  public JSONObject toJSON() {
079    final JSONObject json = new JSONObject();
080
081    final JSONArray patternsArray = new JSONArray();
082    for(final PatternData pattern : patterns) {
083
084      final JSONObject patternJson = new JSONObject();
085      patternJson.put("color", pattern.getColor());
086      patternJson.put("pattern", pattern.getPattern());
087      patternsArray.add(patternJson);
088    }
089    json.put("patterns", patternsArray);
090
091    return json;
092  }
093
094  /**
095   * Reads JSON data and converts it back to this component's data.
096   *
097   * @param json The JSONHelper instance of the JSON data.
098   * @param platform The ItemPlatform instance.
099   */
100  @Override
101  public void readJSON(final JSONHelper json, final ItemPlatform<I, T> platform) {
102    patterns.clear();
103
104    final JSONArray patternsArray = (JSONArray) json.getObject().get("patterns");
105    if(patternsArray != null) {
106      for(final Object obj : patternsArray) {
107
108        final JSONObject patternJson = (JSONObject) obj;
109        final String color = patternJson.get("color").toString();
110        final String pattern = patternJson.get("pattern").toString();
111        patterns.add(new PatternData(color, pattern));
112      }
113    }
114  }
115
116  /**
117   * Used to determine if some data is equal to this data. This means that it has to be an exact
118   * copy of this data.
119   *
120   * @param component The component to compare.
121   * @return True if similar, otherwise false.
122   */
123  @Override
124  public boolean equals(final SerialComponent<I, T> component) {
125    if(!(component instanceof final BannerPatternsComponent<?, ?> other)) return false;
126
127    return Objects.equals(this.patterns, other.patterns);
128  }
129
130  @Override
131  public int hashCode() {
132    return Objects.hash(patterns);
133  }
134
135  /**
136   * Retrieve the list of PatternData objects associated with this BannerPatternsComponent.
137   *
138   * @return List of PatternData objects representing the patterns.
139   */
140  public List<PatternData> patterns() {
141
142    return patterns;
143  }
144
145  /**
146   * Sets the list of patterns for this object by replacing the existing patterns with the provided list.
147   *
148   * @param patterns List of PatternData objects to set as new patterns
149   */
150  public void patterns(final List<PatternData> patterns) {
151    this.patterns.clear();
152    this.patterns.addAll(patterns);
153  }
154
155  public void patterns(final PatternData... patterns) {
156    this.patterns.clear();
157    this.patterns.addAll(Arrays.asList(patterns));
158  }
159
160  /**
161   * Adds a pattern to the list of patterns for this BannerPatternsComponent.
162   *
163   * @param pattern The PatternData to add.
164   */
165  public void patterns(final PatternData pattern) {
166    this.patterns.add(pattern);
167  }
168}
